roleset.name: persuade not to
roleset.note: DISSUADE-V NOTES: This is actually one of my favorite verbs. Go figger. (from dissuade.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Republicans would try to attach a capital-gains provision to that legislation, hoping the political popularity of its other two parts would dissuade Democrats from blocking it.
example.arg: the political popularity of its other two parts
